verses.verse: And Joshua <WH3091> gathered <WH622> all <WH3605> the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> to Shechem, <WH7927> and called <WH7121> for the elders <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> and for their heads, <WH7218> and for their judges, <WH8199> and for their officers; <WH7860> and they presented <WH3320> themselves before <WH6440> God. <WH430>

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> Thus <WH3541> said <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> Your fathers <WH1> dwelled <WH3427> on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> of the flood <WH5104> in old <WH5769> time, <WH5769> even Terah, <WH8646> the father <WH1> of Abraham, <WH85> and the father <WH1> of Nachor: <WH5152> and they served <WH5647> other <WH312> gods. <WH430>

And I took <WH3947> your father <WH1> Abraham <WH85> from the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> of the flood, <WH5104> and led <WH3212> him throughout all <WH3605> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and multiplied <WH7235> his seed, <WH2233> and gave <WH5414> him Isaac. <WH3327>

And I gave <WH5414> to Isaac <WH3327> Jacob <WH3290> and Esau: <WH6215> and I gave <WH5414> to Esau <WH6215> mount <WH2022> Seir, <WH8165> to possess <WH3423> it; but Jacob <WH3290> and his children <WH1121> went <WH3381> down <WH3381> into Egypt. <WH4714>

I sent <WH7971> Moses <WH4872> also and Aaron, <WH175> and I plagued <WH5062> Egypt, <WH4714> according to that which <WH834> I did <WH6213> among <WH7130> them: and afterward <WH310> I brought <WH3318> you out.

And I brought <WH3318> your fathers <WH1> out of Egypt: <WH4714> and you came <WH935> to the sea; <WH3220> and the Egyptians <WH4714> pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> your fathers <WH1> with chariots <WH7393> and horsemen <WH6571> to the Red <WH5488> sea. <WH3220>

And when they cried <WH6817> to the LORD, <WH3068> he put <WH7760> darkness <WH3990> between <WH996> you and the Egyptians, <WH4713> and brought <WH935> the sea <WH3220> on them, and covered <WH3680> them; and your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> what <WH853> <WH834> I have done <WH6213> in Egypt: <WH4714> and you dwelled <WH3427> in the wilderness <WH4057> a long <WH7227> season. <WH3117>

And I brought <WH935> you into the land <WH776> of the Amorites, <WH567> which dwelled <WH3427> on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> Jordan; <WH3383> and they fought <WH3898> with you: and I gave <WH5414> them into your hand, <WH3027> that you might possess <WH3423> their land; <WH776> and I destroyed <WH8045> them from before <WH6440> you.

Then Balak <WH1111> the son <WH1121> of Zippor, <WH6834> king <WH4428> of Moab, <WH4124> arose <WH6965> and warred <WH3898> against Israel, <WH3478> and sent <WH7971> and called <WH7121> Balaam <WH1109> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> to curse <WH7043> you:
But I would <WH14> not listen <WH8085> to Balaam; <WH1109> therefore he blessed <WH1288> you still: so I delivered <WH5337> you out of his hand. <WH3027>

And you went <WH5674> over <WH5674> Jordan, <WH3383> and came <WH935> to Jericho: <WH3405> and the men <WH1167> of Jericho <WH3405> fought <WH3898> against you, the Amorites, <WH567> and the Perizzites, <WH6522> and the Canaanites, <WH3669> and the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Girgashites, <WH1622> the Hivites, <WH2340> and the Jebusites; <WH2983> and I delivered <WH5414> them into your hand. <WH3027>

And I sent <WH7971> the hornet <WH6880> before <WH6440> you, which drove <WH1644> them out from before <WH6440> you, even the two <WH8147> kings <WH4428> of the Amorites; <WH567> but not with your sword, <WH2719> nor <WH3808> with your bow. <WH7198>

And I have given <WH5414> you a land <WH776> for which <WH834> you did not labor, <WH3021> and cities <WH5892> which <WH834> you built <WH1129> not, and you dwell <WH3427> in them; of the vineyards <WH3754> and olive groves <WH2132> which <WH834> you planted <WH5193> not do you eat. <WH398>

Now <WH6258> therefore fear <WH3372> the LORD, <WH3068> and serve <WH5647> him in sincerity <WH8549> and in truth: <WH571> and put <WH5493> away <WH5493> the gods <WH430> which <WH834> your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> of the flood, <WH5104> and in Egypt; <WH4714> and serve <WH5647> you the LORD. <WH3068>

And if <WH518> it seem <WH1961> <WH5869> evil <WH7489> to you to serve <WH5647> the LORD, <WH3068> choose <WH977> you this day <WH3117> whom <WH4310> you will serve; <WH5647> whether <WH518> the gods <WH430> which <WH834> your fathers <WH1> served <WH5647> that were on the other <WH5676> side <WH5676> of the flood, <WH5104> or the gods <WH430> of the Amorites, <WH567> in whose <WH834> land <WH776> you dwell: <WH3427> but as for me and my house, <WH1004> we will serve <WH5647> the LORD. <WH3068>
And the people <WH5971> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> God forbid <WH2486> that we should forsake <WH5800> the LORD, <WH3068> to serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods; <WH430>

For the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> he it is that brought <WH5927> us up and our fathers <WH1> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> from the house <WH1004> of bondage, <WH5650> and which <WH834> did <WH6213> those <WH428> great <WH1419> signs <WH226> in our sight, <WH5869> and preserved <WH8104> us in all <WH3605> the way <WH1870> wherein <WH834> we went, <WH1980> and among all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> through <WH7130> whom <WH834> we passed: <WH5674>

And the LORD <WH3068> drove <WH1644> out from before <WH6440> us all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> even the Amorites <WH567> which dwelled <WH3427> in the land: <WH776> therefore will we also <WH1571> serve <WH5647> the LORD; <WH3068> for he is our God. <WH430>

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> You cannot <WH3808> <WH3201> serve <WH5647> the LORD: <WH3068> for he is an holy <WH6918> God; <WH430> he is a jealous <WH7072> God; <WH410> he will not forgive <WH5375> your transgressions <WH6588> nor your sins. <WH2403>

If <WH3588> you forsake <WH5800> the LORD, <WH3068> and serve <WH5647> strange <WH5236> gods, <WH430> then he will turn <WH7725> and do you hurt, <WH7489> and consume <WH3615> you, after <WH310> that he has done you good. <WH3190>
And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> No; <WH3808> but we will serve <WH5647> the LORD. <WH3068>

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to the people, <WH5971> You are witnesses <WH5707> against yourselves that you have chosen <WH977> you the LORD, <WH3068> to serve <WH5647> him. And they said, <WH559> We are witnesses. <WH5707>

Now <WH6258> therefore put <WH5493> away, <WH5493> said he, the strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> which <WH834> are among <WH7130> you, and incline <WH5186> your heart <WH3824> to the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>
And the people <WH5971> said <WH559> to Joshua, <WH3091> The LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> will we serve, <WH5647> and his voice <WH6963> will we obey. <WH8085>
So Joshua <WH3091> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with the people <WH5971> that day, <WH3117> and set <WH7760> them a statute <WH2706> and an ordinance <WH4941> in Shechem. <WH7927>

And Joshua <WH3091> wrote <WH3789> these <WH428> words <WH1697> in the book <WH5612> of the law <WH8451> of God, <WH430> and took <WH3947> a great <WH1419> stone, <WH68> and set <WH6965> it up there <WH8033> under <WH8478> an oak, <WH427> that was by the sanctuary <WH4720> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> to all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> Behold, <WH2009> this <WH2063> stone <WH68> shall be a witness <WH5713> to us; for it has heard <WH8085> all <WH3605> the words <WH561> of the LORD <WH3068> which <WH834> he spoke <WH1696> to us: it shall be therefore a witness <WH5713> to you, lest <WH6435> you deny <WH3584> your God. <WH430>
So Joshua <WH3091> let the people <WH5971> depart, <WH7971> every man <WH376> to his inheritance. <WH5159>

And it came <WH1961> to pass after <WH310> these <WH428> things, <WH1697> that Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> the servant <WH5650> of the LORD, <WH3068> died, <WH4191> being an hundred <WH3967> and ten <WH6235> years <WH8141> old. <WH1121>

And they buried <WH6912> him in the border <WH1366> of his inheritance <WH5159> in Timnathserah, <WH8556> which <WH834> is in mount <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> on the north <WH6828> side of the hill <WH2022> of Gaash. <WH1608>

And Israel <WH3478> served <WH5647> the LORD <WH3068> all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Joshua, <WH3091> and all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of the elders <WH2205> that outlived <WH748> Joshua, <WH3091> and which <WH834> had known <WH3045> all <WH3605> the works <WH4639> of the LORD, <WH3068> that he had done <WH6213> for Israel. <WH3478>

And the bones <WH6106> of Joseph, <WH3130> which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> brought <WH5927> up out of Egypt, <WH4714> buried <WH6912> they in Shechem, <WH7927> in a parcel <WH2513> of ground <WH7704> which <WH834> Jacob <WH3290> bought <WH7069> of the sons <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of Shechem <WH7927> for an hundred <WH3967> pieces of silver: <WH7192> and it became <WH1961> the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Joseph. <WH3130>

And Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> died; <WH4191> and they buried <WH6912> him in a hill <WH1389> that pertained to Phinehas <WH6372> his son, <WH1121> which <WH834> was given <WH5414> him in mount <WH2022> Ephraim. <WH669>
